mdRecord.dcterms:title: East front of the Mount Vernon Mansion , June 1859
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Walker, Lewis E. (Emory) - possible
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Albumen print mounted to cardboard. View of the east front of the Mansion shows wooden posts supporting the sagging piazza and overall diplatidated state of the structure. Two unidentified men are posing on the piazza, one standing at center and the other seated in a chair at far right. Part of a series of three photographs taken the same day - see also 2019-VR-017.002 and 2019-VR-017.003.
